title: Introduction to Shakespeare-London Study
description: Shakespeare's works as texts, productions, and major historical, aesthetic and cultural touchstones. The author's intellectual and social influences on four centuries of theatre and his subsequent impact on literature and other arts in London. Attendance at play performances required. 3 lectures, 1 activity. Fulfills GE C4 except for English majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Areas A and C1
